title: Introduction to Artificial Intelligence
description: Learn the foundations of Artificial Intelligence, history, branches, and real-world applications.

modules.title: What is AI?
modules.content: AI refers to machine systems capable of performing tasks that typically require human intelligence.

modules.title: History of AI
modules.content: From expert systems to deep learning, explore the evolution of AI.

modules.title: Applications of AI
modules.content: AI is used in medicine, finance, self-driving cars, robotics, and more.

title: Python for Data Science
description: Master Python for analytics, covering NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib and practical data workflows.

modules.title: Python Essentials
modules.content: Variables, loops, functions, and file handling.

modules.title: Working with NumPy
modules.content: Learn vectorized operations and array manipulation.

modules.title: Data Analysis with Pandas
modules.content: Cleaning, merging, slicing, and visualizing data.

title: Machine Learning Basics
description: A comprehensive introduction to ML models, algorithms, and evaluation methods.

modules.title: Regression Models
modules.content: Linear regression, regularization, and evaluation metrics.

modules.title: Classification Models
modules.content: Logistic regression, SVMs, and decision trees.

modules.title: Unsupervised Learning
modules.content: Explore clustering techniques like K-Means and DBSCAN.

title: Deep Learning with Neural Networks
description: Explore how deep neural networks function and build practical models.

modules.title: Neural Network Fundamentals
modules.content: Understand perceptrons, activations, and multi-layer networks.

modules.title: Backpropagation & Optimization
modules.content: Learn how neural networks are trained using gradient descent.

modules.title: CNNs & RNNs
modules.content: Convolutional and recurrent networks in computer vision and NLP.

title: Full-Stack Web Development
description: Become a full-stack developer using modern HTML, CSS, JS, Node.js, and MongoDB.

modules.title: Frontend Foundations
modules.content: HTML, CSS, JavaScript basics, and responsive UI.

modules.title: Backend with Node.js
modules.content: Build secure REST APIs with Express.

modules.title: MongoDB & Deployment
modules.content: Learn CRUD operations, indexing, and cloud deployment.
